modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod changes skins of the snow zombie, Arlene and Boe to be Santa, and two elves.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod changes skins of the snow [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/), Arlene and Boe to be Santa, and two elves.

[**Download**](https://gitlab.com/adredengaming/adreden_modlets/-/archive/master/adreden_modlets-master.zip?path=Adredens_Xmas)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16328-adredens-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Adreden Gaming](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/adreden-gaming/)
